FormData.title: FormData
FormData.description: Represents a handwritten form and its extracted, structured data.

id.description: Unique identifier for the FormData entity.

imageFilename.description: The filename of the uploaded image.

uploadTimestamp.description: The date and time when the image was uploaded.

branch.description: The branch information extracted from the form.

bccdName.description: The BCCD name extracted from the form.

productDescription.description: The product description extracted from the form.

productSrNo.description: The product serial number extracted from the form.

dateOfPurchase.description: The date of purchase extracted from the form.

complaintNo.description: The complaint number extracted from the form.
